thread.title: Hyderabad: 33-year-old woman allegedly kidnapped and gang-raped
thread.title_full: Hyderabad: 33-year-old woman allegedly kidnapped and gang-raped | Latest News & Updates at Daily News & Analysis

author: dna webdesk
title: Hyderabad: 33-year-old woman allegedly kidnapped and gang-raped
text:
Representational Image dna Research & Archives A 33-year-old woman has filed a police complaint stating that she was abducted and gang-raped. According to The New Indian Express, the married woman was allegedly abducted near the Punjagutta police station and taken to a house in the old city where she was gang-raped.The report states that the victim managed to escape and filed a complaint with the police.
She is married and works as a tailor along with her husband. On Saturday night she was going to buy tailoring material and had reportedly called up Shakeel who supplies material to meet her. Minutes later a vehicle came by and she was forced into it, says the report. The people in vehicle were said to be known to her. She was then taken to an old house in Kamatipura where she was raped.
The report adds that a preliminary investigation shows that the woman had been raped. Some people have been taken into custody and are being questioned. The police is said to be examining CCTV footage. The victim has been admitted in hospital. A case of gang-rape has been registered by the Kamatipura police.
